titles.title: When I'm Down, When I'm Down And Out

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
When I'm down, when I'm down and out,
When my Heart is filled with fear and doubt,
I just lift up my hands,
And he lifts up my heart,
And my troubles just all roll away.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Roll them all away, Lord (4x)
I just lift up my hands,
And he lifts up my heart,
And my troubles just all roll away.
